sentences.english: Unlike many, however, Curie felt her place was in Paris. After the radium was in a Bordeaux safe-deposit box, she returned to Paris on a military train.
sentences.chinese: 在鐳安全抵達波多爾市後，她乘軍用火車回到了巴黎。

sentences.english: The Curies are best known for discovering radium.
